description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You successfully use Stealth to Hide and become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Hidden] from all your current foes, or use Stealth to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Sneak] and become undetected to all your current foes.

Using clever technology, magical talent, a divine blessing, or uncanny luck, you slip from sight completely, becoming @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Invisible] for 1 minute, or until you take a hostile action, whichever comes first.
